S06bsu030_u:157_29: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:157_30: na dānaṃ na mātsaryaṃ na śīlaṃ na dauḥśīlyaṃ na kṣāntiṃ na vyāpādaṃ na vīryaṃ na kausīdyaṃ na dhyānaṃ na vikṣepaṃ na prajñāṃ na dauṣprajñyaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:157_31: na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇāni na ṛddhipādāpramāṇāni nendriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyabhijñāḥ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:157_32: na mārgaṃ na mārgaphalaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na duḥkhasamudayaṃ na nirodhaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:157_33: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na bodhisattvabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:157_34: na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na bodhisattvadharmān na buddhadharmān saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:157_36: nāsaṅgatānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ na nirvāṇaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:157_37: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra dharmo na kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:157_38: kathaṃ tasya nirdeśo bhaviṣyati? idamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyannahamevaṃ vadāmi - nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo me dharmaḥ pratibhāyāt,
S06bsu030_u:157_39: yena me pratibhāyāt, yato me pratibhāyāt, yaṃ me ārabhya pratibhāyāditi /
S06bsu030_u:163_0: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - iha khalu suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna kvaciddharme carati /
S06bsu030_u:163_4: viparyāse sa carati / viparyāse caran na bhūte carati /
S06bsu030_u:163_6: abhūtacaryāprabhāvito vā / nāpi viparyāse vā abhūte vā caran bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:163_7: yaśca viparyāsaḥ, so 'bhūtaḥ / na tatra kāciccaryā, tena tatra bodhisattvo na carati /
S06bsu030_u:163_10: na tathā yaiste te dharmāḥ / ye ca na tathā yathā gṛhītāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:163_12: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viparyāse vā abhūte vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:163_14: yatra ca bhūtamaviparyāsaḥ, tatra ca na kāciccaryā / tenocyate - acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:163_16: sā na śakyā ādarśayitum - iyaṃ vā bodhisattvacaryā,
S06bsu030_u:163_17: anena vā bodhisattvacaryā, iha vā bodhisattvacaryā, ito vā bodhisattvacaryeti / naivaṃ bodhisattvacaryā prabhāvitā /
S06bsu030_u:163_18: sarvacaryāvinivṛttaye hi bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti pṛthagjanacaryāvinivṛttaye śrāvakacaryāvinivṛtaye pratyekabuddhacaryāvinivṛttaye /
S06bsu030_u:163_20: teṣvapi bodhisattvā na caranti nābhiniviśante - ime vā te bodhisattvadharmāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:163_30: akalpitā hi sarvadharmāḥ / tadyo dharmaṃ kalpayati, sa vikalpayati / na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmaḥ kalpo vā vikalpo vā /
S06bsu030_u:163_32: vikalpa iti dvitīyo 'ntaḥ / na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'nte carati,
S06bsu030_u:163_33: nāpyanante / yo naiva ante na anante carati,
S06bsu030_u:163_35: madhyamapi suvikrāntavikrāmin samanupaśyan madhye caran anta eva carati /
S06bsu030_u:163_36: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin madhyasya kāciccaryā (vā kiṃci)ddarśanaṃ vā(nidarśanaṃ vā) /
S06bsu030_u:163_38: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:164_0: api tu yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
S06bsu030_u:164_2: sa sarvadharmān na bhāvayanna vibhāvayan bhāvanāsamatikrānto dharmasamatāmanuprāpnoti,
S06bsu030_u:164_4: kutaḥ punarmārgaṃ drakṣyati? pratiprasrabdhamārga iti suvikrāntavikrāmin arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadbhikṣoradhivacanam /
S06bsu030_u:164_5: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? vibhāvito hi sa mārgo na bhāvito na vibhāvitaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:164_6_0: tenocyate vibhāvita iti / vibhāvanāpi tatra nāsti, tenocyate vibhāvita iti / vigatā tasya bhāvanā, tenocyate vibhāvaneti /
S06bsu030_u:164_6_1: sacetkhalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bhāvanā syādvibhāvanā vā,
S06bsu030_u:164_7: sā punarupalabhyate, nāsyā vibhāvanā syāt / vibhāvaneti suvikrāntavikrāmin vigatā asyāṃ bhāvaneti vibhāvanā,
S06bsu030_u:164_8: bhāvo 'syā vigata iti, tenocyate vibhāvaneti, na punaryathocyate / tatkasmāt? avyāhārā hi vibhāvanā,
S06bsu030_u:164_9: vigama eṣa vibhāvanā / katamo vigamaḥ? yato viparyāsasya asamutthānaṃ yadabhūtasyāsamutthānam /
S06bsu030_u:164_10: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāso viparyāsaṃ samutthāpayati /
S06bsu030_u:164_11: asamutthita eṣa viparyāsaḥ / na hi tatra kiṃcitsamutthānam /
S06bsu030_u:164_13: nocyeta / yasmādabhūtasamutthitaḥ, tasmāducyate viparyāsa iti / aviparyāstā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā bodhisattvenānubuddhāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:164_14: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? jñāto hi tena viparyāso 'bhūta iti /
S06bsu030_u:164_19: yaśca aviparyāsasyānubodhaḥ, na tatra bhūyo viparyāsaḥ / yatra (na) kaścidviparyāsaḥ, tatra na kāciccaryā / sarvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin caryā sā caryāsamutthānā /
S06bsu030_u:164_22: yaśca aviparyastaḥ, sa na kvacidbhūyaścarati / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacareti /
S06bsu030_u:164_23: acaryeti suvikrāntavikrāmin yanna kvaciddharme carati na vicarati na caryālakṣaṇaṃ saṃdarśayati,
S06bsu030_u:164_25: ya evaṃ carati, sa carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_0: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:165_2: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvārambaṇāni hi tena viviktāni vijñātāni /
S06bsu030_u:165_3: yaśca vivekaḥ, na tatra kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_4: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaścakṣurārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:165_6: [Vaidya_44] tatkasmāddheto? sarvārambaṇāni hi tena abhūtāni jñātāni /
S06bsu030_u:165_9: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_10: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvārambaṇāni hi tena viparyāsasamutthitāni jñātāni /
S06bsu030_u:165_11: yaśca viparyāsaḥ, so 'bhūtaḥ parijñātaḥ / yena viparyāsaḥ abhūtaḥ parijñātaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:165_14: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāmarūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_19: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhi(sattvā mahāsattvāḥ) sattvārambaṇe (ca ātmārambaṇe) ca carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_20: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? parijñātā hi taiḥ sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca - abhūtaiṣā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ceti /
S06bsu030_u:165_21: yaiśca abhūtā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca jñātā,
S06bsu030_u:165_24: tena ca caryā apagatā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_25_0: ye na suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā jīvasaṃjñāyāṃ vā poṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavotthāpakasamutthāpakakārakakārayitṛvedakavedayitṛsaṃjñāyāṃ
S06bsu030_u:165_30: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā viparyāsairvā dṛṣṭigatairvā nīvaraṇairvā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_33: yā ca parijñā, sā acaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_34: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pratītyasamutpādārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_37: yā ca parijñā pratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādārambaṇasya ca,
S06bsu030_u:165_38: tatra na kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_39: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kāmadhātvārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_43: na tasyāḥ kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_44: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_47: tasyāṃ na kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_48: na [Vaidya_45] hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_51: tatra na kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_52: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā aviparyāsasamyakprahāṇasmṛtyupasthānāpramāṇārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_55: tasyā na kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_56: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā indriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānasamādhisamāpattyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_58: yā ca vibhāvanā, tasyā na kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_59: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_61: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tasyāṃ kācidbhāvanā, na ca tasyāṃ bhūyaḥ kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:165_63: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā vidyāvimuktyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_65: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_66: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā anutpādārambaṇe vā kṣayārambaṇe vā anabhisaṃskārārambaṇe vā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_68: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kācidbhūyaścaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_69: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_71: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_72: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_74: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_75: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_77: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_78: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇārambaṇe bodhisattvāścarantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:165_80: yā ca parijñā, na tatra kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:165_81: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā lakṣaṇapariśuddhyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:165_87: śrāvakasaṃpadārambaṇam, bodhisattvasaṃpadārambaṇam / yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā / tenocyate acaryā bodhisattvacaryeti /
S06bsu030_u:166_0: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi na carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_2: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena rūpārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_4: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:166_5: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na cakṣurārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:166_7: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena yāvanmanaārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_8: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:166_9: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_10: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena yāvaddharmārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_11: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:166_12: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nāmarūpārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_13: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena nāmarūpārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_14: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:166_15: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātmasattvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_17: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:166_18: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na jīvabhavapudgalakārakakārayitrutthāpakasamutthāpakavedakavedayitṛdraṣṭrārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_21: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na viparyāsadṛṣṭigatārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_22: tatkasya hetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena viparyāsadṛṣṭigatārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_23: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:166_24: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nīvaraṇārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_26: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na pratītyasamutpādārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_27: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena pratītyasamutpādārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_28: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_29: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_30: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_31: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇaṃ [Vaidya_47] parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_32: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_34: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātītānāgatapratyutpannārambaṇaviśuddhapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_35: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhāni hi tena atītānāgatapratyutpannārambaṇāni parijñātāni /
S06bsu030_u:166_36: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāsaṅgāvaraṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_37: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena asaṅgārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_38: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nābhijñārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_40: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na sarvajñatārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:166_41: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena sarvajñatārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:166_45: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvārambaṇaprakṛtipariśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:167_0: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ idaṃ rūpamiti na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:167_4: sa evaṃ rūpamasamanupaśyan na rūpamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06bsu030_u:167_6: na rūpe carati na vicarati, na rūpārambaṇe carati na vicarati /
S06bsu030_u:167_13: sa evaṃ vijñānamasamanupaśyan na vijñānamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06bsu030_u:168_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamatītamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:168_1: na rūpamanāgatamiti carati, na rūpaṃ pratyutpannamiti carati /
S06bsu030_u:169_0: na rūpamātmeti carati, na rūpamātmīyamiti carati / evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:169_1: na vijñānamātmeti carati, na vijñānamātmīyamiti carati /
S06bsu030_u:169_2: na rūpaṃ duḥkhamiti carati / evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:170_1: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasamudaye carati,
S06bsu030_u:170_2: na rūpanirodhe carati, na rūpaṃ gambhīramiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:170_3: na rūpamuttānamiti carati, na rūpaṃ śūnyamiti carati, na rūpamaśūnyamiti carati, na rūpaṃ nimittamiti carati, na rūpamanimittamiti carati, na rūpaṃ praṇihitamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:170_6: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / na vijñānasamudaye carati, na vijñānanirodhe carati, na vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:170_16: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin manyitāni spanditāni prapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni /
S06bsu030_u:170_17: ahaṃ carāmīti spanditametat, iha carāmīti prapañcitametat,
S06bsu030_u:170_20: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ sarvāṇyetāni manyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni jñātvā sarvājñānasamuddhātān na kaṃciddharmaṃ manyante,
S06bsu030_u:170_21: amanyamānā na kvaciccaranti, na kvacidālīyante / te anālayā asaṃyogā avisaṃyogā na kvacidutthāpayanti,
S06bsu030_u:170_22: na samutthāpayanti / ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvamanyanāsamuddhātaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:171_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caran na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:171_13: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni /
S06bsu030_u:171_14: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ etāni sarvāṇi vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni jñātvā sarvacaryāsamuddhātāya sarvacaryāparijñāyai prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:172_0: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantometadavocat - acintyeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:172_10: kāmadhātvacintyatayā, rūpadhātvacintyatayā, ārūpyadhātvacintyatayā acintyeyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:172_11_0: ātmācintyatayā, sattvācintyatayā, dānācintyatayā, mātsaryācintyatayā, śīlācintyatayā, dauḥśīlyācintyatayā, kṣāntyacintyatayā,
S06bsu030_u:172_22: asaṅgajñānācintyatayā, nirvāṇācintyatayā, buddhadharmācintyatayā acintyeyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:172_23: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā cittajanikā,
S06bsu030_u:173_2: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yā cittasya prakṛtiḥ sā utpadyate jā jāyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:173_4: tatra cittamapi vivṛtam, yena viparyāsenotpadyate tadati vivṛtam /
S06bsu030_u:173_5: na punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā jānanti vivṛtaṃ cittamiti /
S06bsu030_u:173_8: te cittavivekamajānantaḥ, ārambaṇavivekamajānantaḥ abhiniviśante - ahaṃ cittam,
S06bsu030_u:173_9: mama cittam, asya cittam, asmāccittamiti / te cittamabhiniviśya kuśalamiti vā abhiniviśante,
S06bsu030_u:173_11: sukhamiti vā abhiniviśante, duḥkhamiti vā abhiniviśante /
S06bsu030_u:173_12: uccheda ityabhiniviśante, śāścata ityabhiniviśante, dṛṣṭigata ityabhiniviśante, nīvaraṇa ityabhiniviniśante /
S06bsu030_u:173_18: asmimānamityabhiniviśante / duḥkhamityabhiniviśante / samudayamityabhiniviśante / nirodhamityabhiniviśante / mārgamityabhiniviśante / smṛtyupasthānamityabhiniviśante /
S06bsu030_u:174_0: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ imānevaṃrūpānabhiniveśān sattvānāṃ viparyāsacittajān samanupaśyan na kvacidviparyāse cittamutpādayati /
S06bsu030_u:174_5: tatra bodhisattvo 'pyārambaṇaṃ prajānannapi cittasyotpattiṃ prajānāti - kutaścittamutpadyate? sa evaṃ pratyavekṣate - prakṛtiprabhāsvaramidaṃ cittam /
S06bsu030_u:174_6: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ārambaṇaṃ pratītya cittamutpadyate iti /
S06bsu030_u:174_7: sa ārambaṇaṃ parijñāya na cittamutpādayati nāpi nirodhayati /
S06bsu030_u:174_8: tasya taccittaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭaṃ kamanīyaṃ pariśuddham /
S06bsu030_u:174_9: sa cittānutpādasthito na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati na nirodhayati /
S06bsu030_u:174_11: ya evaṃ carati bodhisattvaḥ, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:174_12: tasyaivaṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:174_17: anena prajñāpāramitā, asya vā prajñāpāramiteti, na carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:174_18: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyāmiti na carati,
S06bsu030_u:175_0: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - anuttareyaṃ caryā bhagavan bodhisattvasya yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:175_1: prabhāsvareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:175_2: niruttareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:175_3: atyadbhuteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:175_4_0: anavakrānteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā māreṇa vā māraparṣadbhirvā anyairvā punaḥ kaiścinnimittacaritairupalambhacaritairātmadṛṣṭibhiḥ
S06bsu030_u:175_5: sarvalokābhyudayacaryeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:176_0: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - evametat suvikrāntavikrāmin,
S06bsu030_u:176_1: evametat / anavakrāntacaryeyaṃ bodhisattvasya māreṇa vā mārakāyikairvā devaputrairmāraparṣadā vā,
S06bsu030_u:176_7: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ caryā śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu030_u:176_8: na teṣāṃ kaścidvyavahāro 'bhaviṣyat - śrāvakayānīyā vā pratyekabuddhayānīyā veti /
S06bsu030_u:176_9: bodhisattvā evābhaviṣyan, te 'pi tathāgatā vā caturvaiśāradyaprāptā abhaviṣyan /
S06bsu030_u:176_10: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin na śrāvakayānīyānāṃ va pratyekabuddhayānīyānāmiyaṃ caryā,
S06bsu030_u:176_11: tasmātte na bodhisattvā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti,
S06bsu030_u:176_14: neyaṃ prajñāpāramitācaryā / evaṃ carantaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyatāmanuprāpnuvanti,
S06bsu030_u:176_15: anabhisaṃbuddhā eva yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ praṇidhānavaśena ca buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāmadhiṣṭhānavaśena /
S06bsu030_u:176_16: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā caturvaiśāradyaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:176_19: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmiṃścaranto bodhisattvāḥ catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nuprāpnuvanti /
S06bsu030_u:176_20: katamāścatasraḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvidaṃ dharmapratisaṃvidaṃ niruktipratisaṃvidaṃ pratibhānapratisaṃvidam /
S06bsu030_u:176_21: ābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgatā anabhisaṃbuddhā eva praṇidhānavaśena vaiśāradyāni pratigṛhṇanti /
S06bsu030_u:176_22: tathāgatā api tān kuśalamūlasamanvāgatāniti viditvā prajñāpāramitābhūmyanuprāptāniti viditvā adhitiṣṭhanti caturvaiśāradyena /
S06bsu030_u:176_23: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nuprāptukāmena kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyakuśalena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ caritavyam /
S06bsu030_u:177_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ hetuṃ ca samudayaṃ ca astaṃgamaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca pravidhyati na kaṃciddharmam,
S06bsu030_u:177_3: teṣāṃ hetusamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇaṃ prajānan na rūpaṃ prabhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_4: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān / na vijñānaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_9: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_10: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_11: nocchedadṛṣṭiṃ na śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_15: va vīryakausīdyaṃ na dhyānavikṣepaṃ na prajñādauṣprajñyaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_20: nānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ nābhisaṃskārajñānaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_22: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_23: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān (na bodhisattvadharmabuddhadharmān) bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_24: na śamathaṃ na vidarśanāṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:177_38: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kācidasti bhāvapariniṣpattiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:177_40: nātra kaścitsvabhāvaḥ / abhāvasvabhāvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:177_41: abhūtā asaṃbhūtāḥ / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? yo hi viparyāsaḥ so 'bhūtaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:177_43: yo hi viparyāsaḥ, so 'bhāvaḥ / bhāvāpagatā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:177_46: so 'saṃbhūtaḥ, tenocyate abhāva iti / asatparidīpanaiṣā suvikrāntavikrāmin abhāva iti /
S06bsu030_u:177_47: yaśca abhāva, tatra na bhāvanā na vibhāvanā /
S06bsu030_u:177_48: viparyāsasamutthitatayā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvā bhāvayanti ca vibhāvayanti ca /
S06bsu030_u:177_49: na tatra kiṃcidbhāvyam / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? abhāvasvabhāvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:177_50_0: bhāvāpagatā vastvasattvāt / na tatra kiṃcidbhāvyam / yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva evaṃ dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī
S06bsu030_u:177_50_1: viharan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
S06bsu030_u:177_52: evaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:178_1: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na rūpasaṃprayoganimittaṃ cittamutpadyate /
S06bsu030_u:178_2: na vedanā, na saṃjñā, na saṃskāraḥ / na vijñānasaṃprayoganimittaṃ cittamutpadyate /
S06bsu030_u:178_25: so 'nayā cittaviśuddhyā samanvāgataḥ sattvān maitryā spharati karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā /
S06bsu030_u:178_30: tasyaibhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣipraṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:178_31: sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na rūpamupaiti,
S06bsu030_u:178_32: nopādatte / na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu030_u:178_34: nopādatte / na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātumupaiti,
S06bsu030_u:178_35: nopādatte / nocchedaśāśvatamupaitī, nopādatte / na pratītyasamutpādamupaiti, nopādatte / na pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātumupaiti,
S06bsu030_u:178_36: nopādatte / na rāgadveṣamohānupaiti, nopādatte / nā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyamupaiti,
S06bsu030_u:178_42: nopādatte / nātmadhātuṃ na sattvadhātuṃ na dharmadhātumupaiti nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:178_44: nopādatte / na pṛthagjanadharmān, na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmānupaiti,
S06bsu030_u:178_47: nopādatte / na nīvaraṇānyupaiti, nopādatte / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin anupagatā anupādattāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:178_48: na kenacidupagatāḥ / na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kaściddharma upādātavyo nāpi kenacidupādattaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:178_50: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? asārakā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā māyopamatayā /
S06bsu030_u:178_58: udakacandrasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā agrāhyatāmupādāya indrāyudharaṅgasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā asatparikalpanatāmupādāya /
S06bsu030_u:178_61: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ sarvadharmān samanupaśyan na kaṃciddharmamupaiti nopādatte,
S06bsu030_u:178_62: nādhitiṣṭhati, nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati / iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaśraddadhānatā anadhiṣṭhānatā anadhyavasānatā anabhiṣvaṅgatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:178_63: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:179_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo na rūpe śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:179_2: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu030_u:179_3: na vijñāne śikṣate na vijñānasamatikramāya śikṣate /
S06bsu030_u:179_4: na rūpotpattau śikṣate, na rūpanirodhe śikṣate / evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:179_5: na vijñānotpattau śikṣate, na vijñānanirodhe śikṣate / na rūpavinayāya śikṣate nāvinayāya /
S06bsu030_u:179_9: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ saṃkrāntaye śikṣate nāvakrāntaye,
S06bsu030_u:179_11: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpanityatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:179_12: na rūpasukhatāyāṃ śikṣate, na rūpaduḥkhatāyāṃ śikṣate na rūpaśubhatāyām,
S06bsu030_u:179_13: na rūpānātmatāyāṃ śikṣate / na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ, na vijñānanityatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:179_15: na vijñānaduḥkhatāyām, na vijñānaśubhatāyāṃ na vijñānātmatāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu030_u:179_16: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpātītārambaṇe carati,
S06bsu030_u:179_18: na vedanā, na saṃjñā, na saṃskārāḥ / na vijñānātītārambaṇe carati,
S06bsu030_u:179_20: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'tītaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yadatītaṃ tacchūnyam,
S06bsu030_u:179_21: evaṃ śāntamanātmeti / evamapi [na] carati / anāgataṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yadatītaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti /
S06bsu030_u:179_22: evamapi (na) carati / pratyutpannaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yatpratyutpannaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti /
S06bsu030_u:179_23: evamapi (na) carati / atītaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena [Vaidya_55] vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06bsu030_u:179_24: evamapi na carati / anāgataṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06bsu030_u:179_25: evamapi na carati / pratyutpannaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā veti,
S06bsu030_u:179_26: evamapi na carati / evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:179_27: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate /
S06bsu030_u:180_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamālambate,
S06bsu030_u:180_1: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06bsu030_u:180_2: na vijñānamālambate / na nāmarūpamālambate, na viparyāsadṛṣṭigatamālambate,
S06bsu030_u:180_3: nātmābhiniveśamālambate, na sattvābhiniveśamālambate, nocchedaśāśvatamālambate, nāntaṃ nānantamālambate / na rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmānālambate /
S06bsu030_u:180_11: na kṣāntivyāpādamālambate / na vīryakausīdyamālambate / na dhyānavikṣepamālambate / na prajñādauṣprajñyamālambate /
S06bsu030_u:180_28: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidgrahaṇaṃ saṃvidyate yatraiṣāmālambanaṃ bhaveta /
S06bsu030_u:180_30: tāvadadhyavasānam, tāvadabhiniveśaḥ, tāvadupādānam / yāvadupādānam, yāvadālambanam, tāvaduḥkhadaurmanasyam, tāvadgāḍhāḥ śokaśalyopāyāsaparidevāḥ saṃbhavanti /
S06bsu030_u:180_39: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imānādīnavān saṃpaśyan na kaṃciddharmamālambate /
S06bsu030_u:180_41: sa nāpyudgrahāya nāgrahāya sthitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tāmapi nirālambanavaśikatāṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:180_42: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśate nābhivadati,
S06bsu030_u:180_44: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmālambanavisaṃyogaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:180_45: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūtiṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:180_46: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ śaknoti kartum,
S06bsu030_u:180_47: na mārakāyikā devatāḥ, na māraparṣat, na mārādhiṣṭhitāḥ / na cāsya te 'vatāraṃ labhante yatrāsya viheṭhān kuryuḥ,
S06bsu030_u:181_0: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na rūpavikalpanāyām /
S06bsu030_u:181_1: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na vikalpanāyām /
S06bsu030_u:181_3: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:181_28: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na buddhadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:181_29: [Vaidya_57] na pṛthagjanabhūmiṃ na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:181_34: na muktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:181_41: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? kalpanāyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin satyāṃ vikalpo bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:181_43: na tatra vikalpanā / sarvabālapṛthagjanā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpanāsamutthitāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:181_47: vikalpaneti dvitīyo 'ntaḥ / yatra nāsti kalpo vā vikalpo (vā),
S06bsu030_u:181_48: tatra nāsti anto vā madhyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:181_49: madhyamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpayataḥ sa evānto bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:181_51: yatra punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin na kalpanā na vikalpanā,
S06bsu030_u:181_52: tatra kalpasamucchedaḥ / kalpasamuccheda iti suvikrāntavikrāmin nātra kasyacicchedaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:181_53: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? anto hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpo vikalpo vikalpasamutthitaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:181_54: teṣāṃ yo vyupaśamaḥ, so 'viparyāsaḥ / yo 'viparyāsaḥ, na tatra kaścicchedaḥ / samuccheda iti suvikrāntavikrāmin duḥkhasamucchedasyaitadadhivacanam /
S06bsu030_u:181_59: yo duḥkhaṃ naiva kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06bsu030_u:181_61: sa evaṃ paśyan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:181_62: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarva(kalpa)vikalpaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:181_63: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:181_65: na ca māraparṣat / utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇi budhyate /
S06bsu030_u:181_67: mārasya ca pāpīyasaḥ parājayaṃ karoti dhyāmīkaroti ca /
S06bsu030_u:181_101: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ ebhiścānyaiśca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ na paryantaḥ śakyo 'dhigantum /
S06bsu030_u:182_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nendriyavikalo bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:182_1_0: sa na rūpavikalo bhavati, na bhogavikalo bhavati, na parivāravikalo bhavati, na jātivikalo bhavati, na kulavikalo bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:182_1_1: na deśavikalo bhavati, na ca pratyunteṣu janapadeṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu030_u:182_2: na cākṣaṇaprāpto bhavati, na cāpariśuddhaiḥ sattvairapariśuddhakarmāntaiḥ saṃsargajāto bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:182_3: na ca svacittaṃ hāpayati, na ca prajñāyā hīyate / sa yān dharmān parataḥ śṛṇoti,
S06bsu030_u:182_13: evaṃ ca mārasya pāpīyaso bhavati - atikrāntaviṣayo 'yaṃ mama,
S06bsu030_u:182_18: uttārayiṣyatīti / tatra māraḥ pāpīyān śocati krandati paridevate - alpapakṣīkariṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvo māmiti /
S06bsu030_u:182_19: daurbalyaṃ cāsya viśati, duḥkhitaśca bhavati durmanā vipratisārī /
S06bsu030_u:182_20: yasmiṃśca samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:182_23: mārāśca pāpīyāṃso duḥkhitā durmanaso bhavanti śokaśalyasamarpitā mahāśokaśalyaviddhāḥ - ativāhayiṣyatyayaṃ bata sattvānasmadviṣayāt,
S06bsu030_u:182_33: imamarthavaśaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃpaśyantaste mārā duḥkhitā bhavanti durmanasaḥ śokaśalyaviddhāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:182_34: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣo mahatā dhanaskandhena vipannena duḥkhito vedanātta(rta)manā mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:182_35: evameva māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhito bhavati durmanā vipratisārī śokaśalyaviddhaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:182_36: na ca svake āsane ramate, yasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:182_38: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin te mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ ekataḥ samāgamya cintayanti - kathaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:182_40: te kathaṃkathāśokaśalyaviddhā bhūtvā upasaṃkrāmanti bodhisattvasyāvatāragaveṣiṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:182_42: na punaḥ kāyasyānyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati cittasyānyathātvaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:182_45: tato māraḥ pāpīyānadhiṣṭhito durbalo bhavati līnacitto bhayamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:182_47: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ahamevāsya na śakto 'vatāraṃ labdhum,
S06bsu030_u:182_49: tataste mārā(strastā utsāhapa)rihīṇāḥ svabhavanāni gatvā duḥkhadaurmanasyajātāḥ pradhyāyantastiṣṭhanti,
S06bsu030_u:182_50: na ca śaknuvanti bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'cchaṭāmātramapi cittasya mohanaṃ kartum,
S06bsu030_u:182_51: prāgevāsyāntarāyam / iyaṃ(daṃ) suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato (bodhisattvasya) evaṃrūpaṃ prajñābalādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:182_54: te sarve mārā bhaveyuḥ, te sarve mahatībhirmāraparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ bodhisattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamupasaṃkrameyurviheṭhābhiprāyāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:182_55: te 'pi sarve suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na prabhavantyantarāyaṃ kartum /
S06bsu030_u:182_56: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathārūpeṇa hi prajñābalādhānena prajñākhaḍgena prajñāśastreṇa tasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:182_57: acintyayā suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñayā aprameyayā asamasamayā bodhisattvastadā samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:182_58: tena taṃ na pratibalo bhavati māraḥ pāpīyānabhibhavitum /
S06bsu030_u:182_62: abhūmirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām / ye 'pi tāvatsuvikrāntavikrāmin bāhyā ṛṣayaścaturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:182_64: ye māraviṣayaṃ kāmadhātumatikramya brahmaloke copapadyante caturṣu ca ārūpyeṣu [Vaidya_60] sadevanikāyeṣu,
S06bsu030_u:182_68: kaḥ punarvādo mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ yeṣāmaviṣayo rūparūpyadhātau /
S06bsu030_u:182_69: balādhānaprāptaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvastasmin samaye bhavati mahābalādhānasamanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitābalena /
S06bsu030_u:182_70: ye khalu kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena prajñāśastreṇa,
S06bsu030_u:182_72: ye kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena ca prajñāśastreṇa,
S06bsu030_u:182_74: aniśritāste bhavanti / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? niśraye hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sati calitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:182_77: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin niśrayaśca bhavati calitaṃ ca bhavati spanditaṃ ca bhavati prapañcanā (ca) bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:182_80: ye 'pi tāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin yāvad bhavāgropapannāḥ sattvā niśritā niśrayanibaddhā niśrayādhyāsitāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:182_85: ye vā punaranye 'pi kecinniśritā ārūpyeṣu niśrayavinibaddhā niśrayādhyāśritāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:182_86: bodhisattvastu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayaṃ karoti,
S06bsu030_u:182_87: aniśrito bhavati sarvatra / yasmin khalu punaḥ samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyokto viharati,
S06bsu030_u:182_91: na nāmarūpaniśrito bhavati, na kāmarūpārūpyadhātuniśrito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:182_95: na tṛṣṇāniśrito bhavati, na bhavatṛṣṇāniśrito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:182_120: sa sarvadharmaiścāniśrito na calati na saṃcalati,
S06bsu030_u:182_123: aniśrayaṃ na manyate / so 'yaṃ niśraya iti nopalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:182_124: iha niśraya iti nopalabhate, asya niśraya iti nopalabhate na manyate,
S06bsu030_u:182_126: sarvaniśrayānamanyamāno 'nupalabhamāno 'nabhiniviśamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayamupaiti nopadiśati nābhinandati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu030_u:182_128: idaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaniśrayaviśuddhijñānadarśanaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:188_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva ādita eva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutpanne citte bahukuśalamūlasaṃbhārasamudāgataśca bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:188_9_0: prajñāvāṃśca bhavati, prajñāviśuddhigurukaḥ / so 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya prajñāpāramitāyāmabhiyukto mārān
S06bsu030_u:188_9_1: pāpīyaso 'dhitiṣṭhati tena prajñābalena ca - yathā me mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'vatāraṃ na labheran,
S06bsu030_u:188_10: mā ca me viheṭhāṃ kuryuḥ / tasyādhiṣṭhāne mārā avatāraṃ na labhante,
S06bsu030_u:188_12: nāpi cittamutpādayanti - kimiti vayamasya bodhisattvasya avatāraṃ gaveṣāmahe,
S06bsu030_u:188_16: saṃvignāśca bhavanti - mā vayaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyāma iti /
S06bsu030_u:188_19: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya prayupasthitā avatāraṃ na labhante /
S06bsu030_u:189_0_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ chandaśca adhyāśayaśca
S06bsu030_u:189_0_1: gauravaṃ va citrīkāraśca śāstṛsaṃjñā ca utpāditā bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:189_1: na ca ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃyuktāyāṃ kathāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā utpāditā bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:189_2: nāpi gambhāīrān dharmān śrutvā kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā vicikitsāyitatvaṃ vā utpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:189_5: anye ca bahavaḥ sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:189_7: tasya pūrvāśayacittaviśuddhitayā pūrvāśayāsaṃkliṣṭatayā na mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:189_12: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na viheṭhāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti /
S06bsu030_u:190_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpayoganimitte carati,
S06bsu030_u:190_12: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaviśuddhinimitte carati /
S06bsu030_u:190_15: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhinimitte carati,
S06bsu030_u:190_16: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhyanimitte carati /
S06bsu030_u:190_19: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṃbhavaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:190_23: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:190_26: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaprakṛtiviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:190_29: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:190_31: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:190_33: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:190_36: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:190_37: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:190_39: na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:190_40: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:190_41: evaṃ caran na rūpeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
S06bsu030_u:190_52: na pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
S06bsu030_u:190_75: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:190_76: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ saṃyogena pratyupasthitā na visaṃyogena /
S06bsu030_u:190_78: visaṃyoga ityuccheda eṣaḥ / sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścidavabodhaḥ yena saṃyujyeran vā visaṃyujyeran vā /
S06bsu030_u:190_79: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya /
S06bsu030_u:190_80: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmāṇāṃ kaścitsaṃyojayitā vā visaṃyojayitā vā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu030_u:190_82: utthāpako vā utthāpayitā vā, samutthāpako vā samutthāpayitā (vā),
S06bsu030_u:190_83: vedako vā vedayitā vā, jñātā vā jñāpayitā vā, saṃyojako vā visaṃyojako vā /
S06bsu030_u:190_84: prajñāpayettathāgataḥ - ayamasau dharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:190_85: utthāpako vā utthāpayitā vā, samutthāpako vā samutthāpayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:190_86: vedako vā vedayitā vā, jñātā vā jñāpayitā vā, saṃyojako vā visaṃyojako vā /
S06bsu030_u:190_87: yasmāttarhi vikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya,
S06bsu030_u:190_88: tasmānna kaściddharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:190_89: utthāpako vā utthāpayitā vā, samutthāpako vā samutthāpayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:190_90: vedako vā vedayitā vā, jñātā vā jñāpayitā vā, saṃyojako vā visaṃyojako vā samupalabhyate /
S06bsu030_u:190_93: na ca viparyāsaḥ kenacitsaṃyukto vā visaṃyukto vā /
S06bsu030_u:190_94: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāsasya vastūpalabhyate,
S06bsu030_u:190_95: nāpi saṃbhava upalabhyate / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? abhūto hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāsaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:190_96: vitatho mṛṣādharmastucchaḥ / na cātra kaściddharma upalabhyate yo 'sau viparyāsa ityucyeta /
S06bsu030_u:190_97: viparyāsa iti suvikrāntavikrāmin vipratilambha eṣa sattvānām,
S06bsu030_u:190_100: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin bāladārako riktena muṣṭinollāpitaḥ saṃjānāti bhūtamiti,
S06bsu030_u:190_101: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā ucchedena viparyāsenollāpitā mūḍhā evaṃ manyante - bhūtametaditi /
S06bsu030_u:190_102: te abhūte bhūtasaṃjñino viparyāsagrastā durmocyā bhavanti tasmādviparyāsāt /
S06bsu030_u:190_103: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvabālapṛthagjanā asaṃyuktā avisaṃyuktā bandhanabaddhāḥ saṃdhāvanti /
S06bsu030_u:190_105: te saṃyoga ityupalabhante, saṃyoga iti sthāpitaṃ paśyanti,
S06bsu030_u:190_107: tatra visaṃyogaḥ / yaḥ punaḥ saṃyogaṃ nopalabhate na manyate nābhiniviśate,
S06bsu030_u:190_108: na visaṃyogamapi sa manyate, so 'tyantavimuktaḥ / sacedvisaṃyogaṃ manyeta vā upalabheta vā abhiniviśeta vā,
S06bsu030_u:190_110: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan na kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate,
S06bsu030_u:190_111: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya pratyupasthito bhavati na visaṃyogāya /
S06bsu030_u:190_112: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃyogavisaṃyogaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:190_113: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāramadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:191_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:191_1: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:191_3: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṅgaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:191_4: na rūpāsaṅgārambaṇe carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgārambaṇe carati /
S06bsu030_u:191_7: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:191_11: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:191_15: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:191_17: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvāṇi hyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin na iñjitāni nimittāni spanditāni caritāni vicaritāni bodhisattvena parijñātāni /
S06bsu030_u:192_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:192_2: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:192_6: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:192_10: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannāsaṅgārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:192_12: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃścaryāṃ samanupaśyati /
S06bsu030_u:192_15: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:193_1: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ vivṛtamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:193_2: na rūpamavivṛtamiti carati / na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:193_5: na rūpaṃ śāntamiti carati, rūpamaśāntamiti carati / na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:193_10: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:193_14: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:193_16: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:193_17: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtyaviviktaṃ cā prakṛtyaśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:193_18: na vedanā na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:193_19: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyuatpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati,
S06bsu030_u:193_20: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛttiśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:193_21: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:194_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:194_1: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu030_u:194_2: na vijñānaṃ manyate / rūpaviśuddhiṃ na manyate, rūpārambaṇaviśuddhiṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:194_4: vijñānaviśuddhiṃ na manyate, vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhiṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:195_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ (prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran) rūpaṃ nābhiniviśate /
S06bsu030_u:195_6: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:195_7: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavati daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām,
S06bsu030_u:195_11: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno dvātriṃśatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇanām /
S06bsu030_u:195_19: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvabuddhadharmaparipūrimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:195_20: [Vaidya_67] evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:195_22: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpe pratiṣṭhate,
S06bsu030_u:195_24: na nāmarūpe pratiṣṭhate / na viparyāsanīvaraṇadṛṣṭigateṣu pratiṣṭhate /
S06bsu030_u:195_46: na nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhate / na buddhajñānabalavaiśāradyeṣu pratiṣṭhate /
S06bsu030_u:195_52: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vidyate /
S06bsu030_u:195_56: ni(nya?) darśayiṣyattathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam - idaṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam,
S06bsu030_u:195_57: ayaṃ dharmāṇāmālayaḥ, ayaṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃcaya iti / yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā apratiṣṭhitāḥ anālayāḥ asaṃcayāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:195_59: tasmāttathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā saṃcayaṃ vā na nirdiśati /
S06bsu030_u:195_61: nāpi svabhāvaḥ kaścit, asaṃbhavādapariniṣpattito dharmāṇāṃ na kaścidavatiṣṭhate /
S06bsu030_u:195_65: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin catasṛṇāṃ mahānadīnāmanavataptāt sarasaḥ prasravantīnāṃ nāstyadhiṣṭhānamanyatra mahāsamudrāt,
S06bsu030_u:195_68: anabhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na tatra sthānaṃ nāsthānaṃ nādhiṣṭhānam,
S06bsu030_u:195_69: sarvatraiṣā gaṇanā nāsti / sthānamiti vā adhiṣṭhānamiti vā asthānamiti vā abhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin gaṇanaiṣā nirdiṣṭā /
S06bsu030_u:195_73: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānayogaḥ [Vaidya_68] prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:195_74: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñadharmān paripūrayati,
S06bsu030_u:196_0: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena arthaṃ kartukāmena,
S06bsu030_u:196_21: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacillokena sahadharmeṇa,
S06bsu030_u:196_25: sarvasattvānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayitukāmena asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ ghaṭitavyaṃ vyāyacchitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam /
S06bsu030_u:196_26_0: nāhaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya kaṃciddharmamevaṃ kṣipraṃ paripūrikaraṃ samanupaśyāmi sarvadharmāṇāṃ yatheha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06bsu030_u:196_26_1: yathānirdiṣṭāyāmabhiyogaḥ pratipattiḥ asya vihārasyānutsargaḥ yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihārāya /
S06bsu030_u:197_0: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06bsu030_u:197_1: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā ime bodhisattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiviti /
S06bsu030_u:197_2: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:197_5: teṣāmapyahaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ vadāmi - niṣṭhā ca tatra gantavyā - mahāprajñāsaṃbhāropacitā hyete kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā,
S06bsu030_u:197_7: yeṣāṃ ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparivartanirdeśo hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:197_8: kiṃcāpi tatra kecinna vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti saṃmukhaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:197_9: atha ca punarveditavyametat - āsannā hyete vyākaraṇasya,
S06bsu030_u:198_1: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante,
S06bsu030_u:198_2: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā hyete sattvā uttarakuruṣūpapatteḥ /
S06bsu030_u:198_3: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hasyaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:198_5: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaṃ prayacchanti muktatyāgāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:198_6: sattvāṃśca dānena priyavadyatayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca saṃgṛhṇanti,
S06bsu030_u:198_7: śīlaṃ ca rakṣanti, nihatamānāśca bhavati, niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramime sattvā mahābhogā bhavantyuccakulīnāśca /
S06bsu030_u:199_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaśīlāśca bhavanti śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:199_1: kṣāntisaṃpannāśca bhavanti, vīryadhyānapratiṣṭhitāḥ prajñayā samanvāgatāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:199_6: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastagatā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:200_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ purato 'rthakaraṇe saṃniṣaṇṇasya cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati,
S06bsu030_u:200_3: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitāparivarto hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:201_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlasamanvāgatāśca bhaviṣyanti śobhanasamācārāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:201_3: śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti, mahājanasya ca kṛtyakāriṇo bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:201_4: devopapattiṃ cākāṅkṣanti, veditavyametat - kṣipramete cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ sahavratāyopapatsyante,
S06bsu030_u:201_6: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin pariśuddhataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāśca pūrvaṃ ca dāna dadati paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjate,
S06bsu030_u:201_7: prāk cānyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyāni kurvanti paścādātmanaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:201_10: veditavyametat - acirādete aprakampyaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśatāmaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:201_12: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upanaṃsyate,
S06bsu030_u:202_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvāścaturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:202_2: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya [Vaidya_70] kasyacid bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśa upanaṃsyate,
S06bsu030_u:203_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vārṣikeṣu māseṣu pratyupasthiteṣu iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī meghān pratītya snigdhā bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:203_1: anupūrveṇa ca pravarṣati, devenābhiṣyandamānā uparyupari udakaṃ pravarṣanti,
S06bsu030_u:203_4: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī abhyantarā ca abhiṣyanditā snigdhā ca bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:203_5: upariṣṭācca udakamuhyate, yathā nimnāni ca sthalāni saṃtarpayati,
S06bsu030_u:203_7: te 'bhiṣyanditāḥ santo bahūn śākhāpatrapalāśān muñcanti bahupuṣpaphalāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:203_9: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī puṣpaphalotsasarastaḍāgaistasmin samaye upaśobhitā bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:203_10: tataśca tuṣṭā bhavanti manuṣyāśca amanuṣyāśca tāni puṣpaphalāni paribhuñjamānāstaṃ ca gandhaṃ jighrantaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:203_11: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yadā bodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhimukhī bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:204_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye 'navataptasya nāgarājasya bhavane sattvā upapannāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:204_1: te catvāro mahānadīrutsṛjati yā mahāsamudraṃ saṃtarpayanti /
S06bsu030_u:204_2: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastamupanaṃsyati,
S06bsu030_u:204_3: asyāṃ na śikṣiṣyante, sarve te mahādharmadhārāḥ pravarṣanti,
S06bsu030_u:205_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye kecitsattvāḥ sumeroḥ parvatarājasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmanti,
S06bsu030_u:205_1: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇā bhavanti /
S06bsu030_u:205_2: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:205_3: sarve te ekāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyanti yaduta tathāgatagatiṃ sarvajñatāgatim /
S06bsu030_u:206_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sāgaro mahāsamudraḥ sarvodakasaṃdhārayitā,
S06bsu030_u:206_2: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:206_3: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramayaṃ sarvadharmasāgaratāṃ sarvadharmabhājanatāṃ sarvadharmasamavasaraṇatāmanuprāpsyati,
S06bsu030_u:207_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sūryamaṇḍalamabhyudgacchat sarvā diśaḥ prabhādhyāmīkaroti,
S06bsu030_u:207_1: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānāṃ dharmāvabhāsakṛtyena pratyutpasthito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:207_2: ihābhyudgacchan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ [Vaidya_71] sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlāvabhāsena pratyupasthito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:208_0: asyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo 'gratāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:208_2: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? eṣā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin agrā śikṣā jyeṣṭhā varā pravarā anuttarā niruttarā yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā /
S06bsu030_u:208_3: asyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāṃ prāpnoti,
S06bsu030_u:208_7: asyāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śikṣāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carantaḥ śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca /
S06bsu030_u:208_8: asyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ supratiṣṭhitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvasattvebhyo 'nuttarāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ saṃprakāśitavantaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:208_9: saṃprakāśayanti ca / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvalokābhyudgataśikṣā hyeṣā suvikrāntavikrāmin yaduta prajñāpāramitāśikṣā /
S06bsu030_u:208_11: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣito bhavati laukike vā lokottare vā,
S06bsu030_u:208_12: saṃskṛte vā asaṃkṛte vā, sāsrave vā anāsrave vā, sāvadye vā anavadye vā / na kvacitsaṅgaṃ janayati, sarvadharmāsaṅgavihārī bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:208_13: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin asaktā abaddhā amuktāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:208_14: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṅgena pratyupasthitā na bandhanena /
S06bsu030_u:208_39: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bandhanaṃ nopalabhyate /
S06bsu030_u:208_42: asaktā iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na teṣāṃ kaścinmocayitā,
S06bsu030_u:208_47: nātra kaścidupalabhyate, yaḥ saṃyujyeta vā badhyeta vā /
S06bsu030_u:208_48: yataśca nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃyujyate vā badhyeta vā,
S06bsu030_u:208_49: tena asaṅga ityucyate / abaddha iti suvikrāntavikrāmin bandhānanupalabdhitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:208_54: tena abaddha ityucyate / yaśca asakto 'baddhaḥ, kutastasya muktiḥ? yaśca na sajjate na badhyate,
S06bsu030_u:208_57: tenocyate vimukta iti / mokṣo 'sya bhūyo na saṃvidyate /
S06bsu030_u:208_59: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu030_u:208_61: imāmahaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin mudrāṃ sthāpayāmi bodhisattvānāṃ saṃśayacchedāya prajñāpāramitāmabhiyuktānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām /
S06bsu030_u:208_63: na pratibalā mama śrāvakā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudrāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ dhārayitum /
S06bsu030_u:209_0_0: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrapālasusārthavāhapūrvaṃgamāni pañcamātrāṇi bodhisattvaśatānyāmantrayate sma suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ
S06bsu030_u:209_0_1: ca bodhisattvam - śakyatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāstathāgate parinirvṛte paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimikāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye
S06bsu030_u:209_0_2: saddharmavipralope vartamāne saṃkṣīṇakāle imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītaṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ prajñāpāramitāpūrvaṃgamaṃ
S06bsu030_u:209_1: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitum? evamukte bodhisattvā bhagavantametadavocat - śakyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītamanuttaraṃ
S06bsu030_u:210_2: kiṃcāpi bhagavan sa kālo mahābhayo mahākāntāro mahāghoraśca bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:210_3: yadbhūyasā ca tasmin samaye sattvāḥ saddharmavyavanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:210_4_0: viṣamalobhalubdhā viṣamarāgaraktā adharmarāgaraktā īrṣyālobhaparītacetasaḥ krodhanāścaṇḍāḥ paruṣāḥ durvacasaḥ śaṭhāḥ kuhakā
S06bsu030_u:210_4_1: māyāvino 'dharmacāriṇaḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavivādavigrahabahulā asaṃvarasthitāḥ lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ kusīdāḥ hīnavīryā muṣitasmṛtayo
S06bsu030_u:210_5: asya gambhīrasya dharmavinayasya dharmaratnakoṣasya apratyudgatamanaḥśīlāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:210_6: atha ca punarutsahāmahe vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrakuśalamūlasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ dhārayituṃ vācayitum,
S06bsu030_u:210_7: ye ca tasminnantakāle parīttaparīttā api [Vaidya_73] sattvā bhaviṣyanti ebhirdharmairarthikāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:210_8: eṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitukāmā, aśaṭhā ṛjavo 'māyāvinaḥ, ye jīvitamapi parityajeyuḥ, na punareṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyarthikā bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu030_u:210_11: teṣāmarthaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ, utsāhaṃ ca dāsyāmaḥ, eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:210_13: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmidaṃ dharmādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśamadhitiṣṭhiti sma,
S06bsu030_u:210_14: mārasya ca pāpīyaso 'smin dharmaparyāye mārapāśānāṃ chedāya adhiṣṭhānamakarot /
S06bsu030_u:210_15: atha khalu bhagavān smitaṃ prāviṣkaroti sma,
S06bsu030_u:210_18: manuṣyā api devān / ye tatra saṃnipatitā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:210_21: mahāntaṃ ca nirnādanirghoṣamakārṣuḥ - mahādhiṣṭhānaṃ batedaṃ tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yatrāgatirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām /
S06bsu030_u:210_22: sarvamārapāśa hi cchinnā anena dharmādhiṣṭhānena ca /
S06bsu030_u:210_23: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca bhūyo mārebhyaḥ pāpīyobhyo 'bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam /
S06bsu030_u:210_24: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:210_26: māraṃ ca te pāpīyāṃsaṃ sasainyaṃ parājayiṣyanti ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:211_0: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - evametatsuvikrāntavikrāmin,
S06bsu030_u:211_2: baddhasīmā suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmasmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe tathāgatena /
S06bsu030_u:211_3: ye 'tra khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:211_6: anākramaṇīyāśca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:211_10: na khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃkliṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:211_13: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti hastyājāneyā vā aśvājāneyā vā,
S06bsu030_u:211_19: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin manuṣyājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmime evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ paribhogāya hastaṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu030_u:211_20: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin [Vaidya_74] upoṣadho nāgarājaḥ supratiṣṭhitaśca nāgarājaḥ airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:211_23: nāpi te anyeṣāṃ devānāmupabhogāya paribhogāya saṃkrāmanti,
S06bsu030_u:211_25: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindro 'bhikrāmati vyūhaṃ kṛtvā,
S06bsu030_u:211_26: tathā tathā cāpi nāgarājānastādṛśameva vyūhaṃ kṛtvā upasaṃkrāmanti paribhogāya /
S06bsu030_u:211_27: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti manuṣyendrāḥ puruṣendrāḥ teṣāmime dharmaparyāyā upabhogaparibhogāya bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:211_29: teṣāṃ ceme dharmaparyāyā mahāvyūhā mahāviṣkārā mahādharmālokā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:211_32: asya dharmaparyāyasya ekaṃ nayaṃ ye dhārayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:211_33: kaḥ punarvādo ye sakalasamāptaṃ lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vaistārikaṃ ca kariṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:211_35: parigṛhītāste khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin anena dharmaparyāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu030_u:212_0: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe anekairaprameyairbodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt /
S06bsu030_u:212_2: niyatāśca te tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā abhūvan bodhāya /
S06bsu030_u:215_3: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṃgatās
S06bsu030_u:216_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S06bsu030_u:216_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ // 2 //
